T02TD1807E:117a-3: ro bsreg pa'i cho ga / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1807E:117a-4: thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1807E:117a-5: gnyis med zhe sdang rdo rje gtso //
T02TD1807E:117a-6: srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i grur gyur la //
T02TD1807E:117a-7: gus pas rab tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1807E:117a-8: las las skyes pa'i sems can rnams //
T02TD1807E:117a-9: tshe 'das sdig pa sbyang ba dang //
T02TD1807E:117a-10: srid pa'i gze ba las bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02TD1807E:117a-11: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i ro bsreg brtsam //
T02TD1807E:117a-12: dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam //
T02TD1807E:117a-13: me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan //
T02TD1807E:117a-14: ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs gang //
T02TD1807E:117a-15: slob dpon las la mkhas pa dang //
T02TD1807E:117a-16: las kyi rdo rje dag gis ni //
T02TD1807E:117a-17: de ru bsreg pa dag tu gsungs //
T02TD1807E:117a-18: dang por las kyi rim pa dag / bla ma nyid kyi zhal snga nas //
T02TD1807E:117a-19: cho ga nyi shur rgyas mdzad pas //
T02TD1807E:117a-20: rim pa bdag gis 'dir ma bris //
T02TD1807E:117a-21: de ltar rim par byas nas kyang//
T02TD1807E:117a-22: sta gon gnas pa'i dus dag tu //
T02TD1807E:117a-23: dag cing byin brlab gnang bya'i phyir //
T02TD1807E:117a-24: dri dang bdud rtsis bkru ba dang //
T02TD1807E:117a-25: srung skud byin rlabs tshul bzhin bya //
T02TD1807E:117a-26: bde gshegs sa bon rnams kyang dgod //
T02TD1807E:117a-27: de nas dkyil 'khor thig gdab ni //
T02TD1807E:117a-28: cho ga nyi shu'i tshul dag tu //
T02TD1807E:117a-29: btab nas me thab bca' bar bya //
T02TD1807E:117a-30: me thab tshad ni pho brang tshad //
T02TD1807E:117a-31: pho brang dkyil 'khor tshad dag ni //
T02TD1807E:117a-32: bdag nyid ji tsam 'dod kyi bar //
T02TD1807E:117a-33: de srid du ni bdag gis bya //
T02TD1807E:117a-34: rdo rjer ba'i zhing tshad du //
T02TD1807E:117a-35: dbangs kyang de bzhin shes par bya //
T02TD1807E:117a-36: zabs su khru gang sor bzhi bru //
T02TD1807E:117a-37: ba yi lci bas byugs pa dang //
T02TD1807E:117a-38: de ltar byi dor byas nas kyang //
T02TD1807E:117a-39: dang po'i thig so bzung nas ni //
T02TD1807E:117a-40: de bzhin du ni gdab par bya //
T02TD1807E:117a-41: de nas lha ni sum cu gnyis //
T02TD1807E:117a-42: tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya //
T02TD1807E:117a-43: shing bu dag kyang brtsig par bya //
T02TD1807E:117a-44: slob dpon rig mar bcas pa'am //
T02TD1807E:117a-45: yang na thugs ka las phyung ste //
T02TD1807E:117b-0: rim pa bzhin du bskyed nas @117b kyang ;
T02TD1807E:117b-1: / dam tshig lha rnams dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1807E:117b-2: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang dang //
T02TD1807E:117b-3: gzhug dang bcing dang dgyes bskyed nas //
T02TD1807E:117b-4: mchod dbul bstod ba bya ba dang //
T02TD1807E:117b-5: zhu gnas gsol ba la sogs bya //
T02TD1807E:117b-6: rdzogs nas ro ni drang ba'o //
T02TD1807E:117b-7: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
T02TD1807E:117b-8: sna tshogs pa yis brgyan byas nas //
T02TD1807E:117b-9: shar sgor bcug ste lan gsum bskor //
T02TD1807E:117b-10: de nas rim bzhin dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1807E:117b-11: dbang bskur zin dang gnas su gzhag / bdag gis byang du kha bltas te //
T02TD1807E:117b-12: cho ga nyi shu'i tshul dag tu //
T02TD1807E:117b-13: mchod rdzas la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag / bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsang gtor bya //
T02TD1807E:117b-14: bsil yab kyis ni me sbar ro //
T02TD1807E:117b-15: aom dzva la dzva la h'um phat /
T02TD1807E:117b-16: gco bo spyan drangs me lha bskyed //
T02TD1807E:117b-17: ram las byung ba'i me lha ni //
T02TD1807E:117b-19: spyan gsum ral pa'i thor tshugs can //
T02TD1807E:117b-20: phyag bzhi mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba //
T02TD1807E:117b-21: g-yas pas tho ba mchog sbyin bya //
T02TD1807E:117b-23: de ltar tshul bzhin byas nas kyang //
T02TD1807E:117b-24: ye shes me lha spyan drang ba //
T02TD1807E:117b-25: aom takki ti ni p'a pa ka aagna ye takki ni h'um dza:/
T02TD1807E:117b-26: gzhug dang bcing dang dgyes pa bskyed //
T02TD1807E:117b-27: de la zhal bsil mchod yon dang //
T02TD1807E:117b-28: sreg rdzas lnga'am bdun du dbul //
T02TD1807E:117b-31: aom ni ri ti h'um kham /
T02TD1807E:117b-35: aom a'a:badzra dh'u ppe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-37: aom a'a:badzra gandhe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-39: aom a'a:badzra d'i pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-41: aom a'a:badzra nee bi tye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-45: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-47: aom badzra bi dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-49: aom badzra ma h'a bee g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-51: aom badzra ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02TD1807E:117b-53: aom badzra gha sma ri sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-55: aom badzra a'a dzny'a pa ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-57: aom po dhi bhriksha ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-59: aom badzra la t'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-61: aom badzra ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-63: aom badzra ha sa ka r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1807E:117b-65: ma lha'i rgyal po las kyi gtso //
T02TD1807E:118a-0: @118a * // phrin las kun la snyoms mdzad pa //
T02TD1807E:118a-1: thams cad kun gyi bdag po ste //
T02TD1807E:118a-2: mnyam snyoms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1807E:118a-3: bstod nas me lhar gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1807E:118a-4: me lha rdo rje las kyi gtso //
T02TD1807E:118a-5: tshe 'das sems can sbyang ba dang //
T02TD1807E:118a-6: lha rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1807E:118a-7: de nyid du ni phrin las mdzod //
T02TD1807E:118a-8: phrin las rnam pa gnyis zhes bya //
T02TD1807E:118a-9: me lha'i rgyal po'i thugs ka nas //
T02TD1807E:118a-10: ye shes 'bar ba'i me phyung ste //
T02TD1807E:118a-11: tshe 'das sems can mi mthun phyogs //
T02TD1807E:118a-12: rnam rtog bag chags bsreg pa dang //
T02TD1807E:118a-13: lha rnams tshim par bya ba'o //
T02TD1807E:118a-14: rtog pa'i dngos po bsregs nas kyang //
T02TD1807E:118a-15: sgyu ma chu zla lta bu yi //
T02TD1807E:118a-16: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1807E:118a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' lha rnams kyi //
T02TD1807E:118a-18: thugs kar ye shes tshul du bzhugs //
T02TD1807E:118a-19: tshim par bya ba'i rim pa dag / rang la mchod yon dbul ba dang //
T02TD1807E:118a-20: sreg rdzas rim pa bzhin du ni //
T02TD1807E:118a-21: rnal 'byor pa yis grub tshad dbul //
T02TD1807E:118a-22: sngags kyi thog mar rang sngags gzhug / thal bar gyur pa'i phung po dag / bshad gci'i mthar ni rnam par brtag / de nas bstod dang bsdu ba bya //
T02TD1807E:118a-23: yi ge gsum gyis bsdu pa'o //
T02TD1807E:118a-24: tshe 'das don du bdag gis ni //
T02TD1807E:118a-25: ro bsreg cho ga 'di byas pas//
T02TD1807E:118a-26: 'di las dge ba gang thob pas //
T02TD1807E:118a-27: thams cad gnyis med thob par shog / tshe 'das pa yi sems can 'di //
T02TD1807E:118a-28: dbang bskur byang chub sems bskyed nas //
T02TD1807E:118a-29: lha rnams tshim par byas pa dang //
T02TD1807E:118a-30: rtog pa'i dngos po bsregs pa yis //
T02TD1807E:118a-31: bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyung ste //
T02TD1807E:118a-32: rdo rje bzlas pa thob par shog / rdo rje bzlas nas rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1807E:118a-33: sems la dmigs pa thob par shog / sems la dmigs pa thob gyur nas //
T02TD1807E:118a-34: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim thob shog / bdag byin brlab pa'i rim thob nas //
T02TD1807E:118a-35: 'od gsal ba ni thob gyur cig /'od gsal ba ni thob gyur nas //
T02TD1807E:118a-36: chos sku mkha' dang 'dra ba las //
T02TD1807E:118a-37: zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02TD1807E:118a-38: sprin lta bu ni 'byung gyur cig / de las sprul sku char lta bus //
T02TD1807E:118a-39: srid pa'i rgya mtshor sprul gyur nas //
T02TD1807E:118a-40: sems can thams cad sgrol bar shog / gsang ba 'dus pa'i ro bsreg gi cho ga 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1807E:118b-0: // / rgya gar gyi @118b mkhan po shraddh'a ka ra warma dang /
T02TD1807E:118b-1: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
